vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐπιτελ-έω,
future -τελῶ[Refs 4th c.BC+], Doric dialect3rd.pers. plural future -τελεσσεῦντι[Refs 2nd c.BC+], 3rd.pers. plural perfect -τετελέκαντι[Refs 3rd c.BC+]:—complete, finish, accomplish, ἐ. τὰ ἐπιτασσόμενα [Refs 5th c.BC+]; τὸν προκείμενον ἄεθλον[Refs 5th c.BC+]; especially of the fulfilment of oracles, visions, etc., [Refs 5th c.BC+]; εὐχήν[Refs 5th c.BC+] —middle, τὴν κρίσιν ἐπιτελέσασθαι get it completed, [Refs 5th c.BC+] —passive, ὅπως ἂν ἡ εἰρήνη ἐπιτελεσθῇ that it may be brought to pass, Decrees cited in [Refs 4th c.BC+]; of movements, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; [παθήματα] τῇ ἀδελφότητι ἐ.[NT]
__2 bring to perfection, τὴν γένεσιν [Refs 4th c.BC+]:—passive, [Refs]
__3 passive in Logic, of a syllogism, to be made perfect, by reduction to the first figure, [Refs]
__II discharge a religious duty, θυσίας [Refs 5th c.BC+]; τὰ νομιζόμενα τοῖς θεοῖς [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; νηστείας καὶ ὁρτάς [NT+5th c.BC+](so in middle, εὐωχίαν ἐπετελέσατο [Refs 1st c.BC+]: absolutely, sacrifice, τινί [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II.2 celebrate, τὴν τοῦ Κυνὸς ἐ. ἐπιτολήν [Refs 6th c.AD+]
__III pay in full, ἀποφορήν [Refs 5th c.BC+]middle, ἐπιτελεῖσθαι τὰ τοῦ γήρως to have to pay, be subject to, the burdens of old age, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἐ. θάνατον have to pay the debt of death, [Refs] —passive, ἡ δίκη.. τοῦ φόνου.. ἐκ Μαρδονίου ἐπετελέετο was paid in full by.., [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__IV impose upon, ἀσεβείας δίκην τινί [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to finish, complete, end; to perfect, attain a goal; (middle) to undergo
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to finish, complete, end; to perfect, attain a goal; (middle) to undergo
to bring to an end; to finish, complete, perfect, Rom. 15:28; 2Cor. 8:6, 11; to perform, Lk. 13:32; to carry into practice, to realize, 2Cor. 7:1; to discharge, Heb. 9:6; to execute, Heb. 8:5; to carry out to completion, Phil. 1:6; middle to end, make an end, Gal. 3:3; passive to be fully undergone, endured, 1Pet. 5:9
vocabInfos._es_Definition: completar, lograr ; finalizar, terminar ; ejecutar (una tarea) ; someter a (sufrimiento); erigir, levantar (una tienda)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 使完結, 結束
2) 完成, 表現, 帶出
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 使完结, 结束
2) 完成, 表现, 带出
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: hoàn thành; xong việc; đạt được mục đích. ἐπί (G1909) + τελέω (G5055)
